title: Ed McBain - Matthew Hope series (untouched retail)
description:
Books are in AZW3 format, untouched (although metadata and cover files have been added) and ready to convert with Calibre.

Calibre is a great program, but when you convert a book multiple times, you end up with some pretty ugly HTML.  Also, different people have different options when they convert, and sometimes it's not easy to get what you want if the other conversions were too different in options.

01 - Goldilocks
02 - Rumpelstiltskin
03 - Beauty & The Beast
04 - Jack & The Beanstalk
05 - Snow White & Rose Red
06 - Cinderella
07 - Puss in Boots
08 - The House That Jack Built
09 - Three Blind Mice
10 - Mary, Mary
11 - There Was a Little Girl
12 - Gladly the Cross-Eyed Bear
13 - The Last Best Hope
